These figures cooperate or compete based on profit. **Potential Alliances**: - Kozrek + Vaelith: Naval power + criminal network - Gorrath + Rennick: Mercenaries + money - Everyone + Nix: Information is valuable to all **Rivalries**: - Kozrek vs Graza: Fleet command disputes - Vaelith vs Rennick: Shadow vs legitimate trade - Gorrath vs Skrag: Warrior pride --- ## Threat to Major Powers The Broken Isles raid both the [Thelassian](/factions/thelassian) and [Aloria](/factions/aloria): - Pirate attacks on shipping - Smuggling undermines trade controls - Safe haven for criminals and fugitives - Mercenaries available to highest bidder Neither power can eliminate them without committing forces they can't spare. --- ## See Also - [The Broken Isles](/factions/the-broken-isles) - Faction overview - [History of the Broken Isles](/history/history-of-the-broken-isles) - How they formed - Individual location files in `/02-Geography/`
